comments.html:
Hi Ivan,

Appreciate your warm, thoughtful, and, of course, justifiably snarky comments. I’ll make sure the IOS-XE documentation team not only fixes this but also other issues in that document that are clearly below the standard we should strive for.

As a side note, I’d love to see you again at one of the upcoming PLNOG conferences. We’ve met a couple of times long, long ago - including that time in Krakow when even Greg Ferro himself decided to come down to Poland to visit NOG :)

Best regards to You and Dear Readers!
